fields.name: SITE_ID
fields.description: ID number of each site collecting data

fields.name: MONTHS
fields.description: Month data was collected in e.g. January

fields.name: YEARS
fields.description: Year data was collected in e.g. 2016

fields.name: HOURS
fields.description: Hour data was collected in e.g. 0..23

fields.name: SATURDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: SUNDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: MONDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: TUESDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: WEDNESDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: THURSDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: FRIDAY
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time
